name: biosscope-bcodmo-datasets
title: Bermuda Institute of Ocean Sciences Simons Collaboration on Ocean Processes and Ecology

sources.title: ZooSCAN images of zooplankton collected during BATS MOCNESS tows during R/V Atlantic Explorer cruises AE1614, AE1712, AE1830, and AE1819 in the vicinity of the Bermuda Atlantic Time-series Study from 2016 to 2018
ZooSCAN biovolume to biomass from imaged zooplankton collected during MOCNESS tows during various R/V Atlantic Explorer cruises and small boat deployments in the Sargasso Sea betwen 2016 to 2019

ZooSCAN output from of imaged zooplankton collected during BATS MOCNESS tows during R/V Atlantic Explorer cruises AE1614, AE1712, AE1830, and AE1819 in the vicinity of the Bermuda Atlantic Time-series Study from 2016 to 2018
BIOS-SCOPE survey biogeochemical data as collected on Atlantic Explorer cruises (AE1614, AE1712, AE1819, AE1916) from 2016 through 2019
Chemical analyses of size-fractionated particle samples collected during the BIOS-SCOPE cruise AE1819 in the Sargasso Sea in July 2018
Size fractionated Amino Acid data collected in the Sargasso Sea during BIOS-SCOPE cruises AE2114 and AE2123 in August and November 2021
Size fractionated carbohydrate data collected in the Sargasso Sea during BIOS-SCOPE cruises AE2114 and AE2123 in August and November 2021
Size Fractionated Particulate Organic Carbon (POC) and Particulate Organic Nitrogen (PON) collected during BIOS-SCOPE cruises (2018-2023) aboard the R/V Atlantic Explorer

ZooSCAN images of zooplankton collected during BATS MOCNESS tows during R/V Atlantic Explorer cruises AE1614, AE1712, AE1830, and AE1819 in the vicinity of the Bermuda Atlantic Time-series Study from 2016 to 2018

ZooSCAN images of zooplankton collected during BATS MOCNESS tows during R/V Atlantic Explorer cruises AE1614, AE1712, AE1830, and AE1819 in the vicinity of the Bermuda Atlantic Time-series Study from 2016 to 2018

ZooSCAN images of zooplankton collected during BATS MOCNESS tows during R/V Atlantic Explorer cruises AE1614, AE1712, AE1830, and AE1819 in the vicinity of the Bermuda Atlantic Time-series Study from 2016 to 2018

ZooSCAN images of zooplankton collected during BATS MOCNESS tows during R/V Atlantic Explorer cruises AE1614, AE1712, AE1830, and AE1819 in the vicinity of the Bermuda Atlantic Time-series Study from 2016 to 2018
ZooSCAN biovolume to biomass from imaged zooplankton collected during MOCNESS tows during various R/V Atlantic Explorer cruises and small boat deployments in the Sargasso Sea betwen 2016 to 2019

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: object_id
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Organismal identification number. Typically cruiseID_mocnessID_net#_taxonomy_image# unless from a Reeve tow

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: object_feret
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Zooscan pixel measurement of feret diameter. Object maximum feret diameter, i.e., the longest distance between any two points along the object boundary in pixels.

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: object_esd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Zooscan pixel measurement of estimated spherical diameter (Object Equivalent Spherical Diameter).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: object_area_exc
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Zooscan pixel measurement of area (Zooscan "Area_exc"). Surface of the object excluding holes in square pixel (=Area*(1-(%area/100)).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: BioVolume
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: particle biovolume assuming an ellipsoidal shape

sources.title: ZooSCAN output from of imaged zooplankton collected during BATS MOCNESS tows during R/V Atlantic Explorer cruises AE1614, AE1712, AE1830, and AE1819 in the vicinity of the Bermuda Atlantic Time-series Study from 2016 to 2018

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: object_date
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Date of Collection in format yyyymmdd

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: object_time
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Time of Collection in format hhmmss

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: object_annotation_hierarchy
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Taxonomic classification (predicted except for AE1712 which was validated)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: object_feret
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Object Maximum feret diameter, i.e., the longest distance between any two points along the object boundary in pixels

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: ISO_DateTime_UTC
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Datetime (UTC) of Collection in ISO 8601 format yyyy-mm-ddTHH:MMZ.

sources.title: BIOS-SCOPE survey biogeochemical data as collected on Atlantic Explorer cruises (AE1614, AE1712, AE1819, AE1916) from 2016 through 2019

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Cast
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Cast number according to CTD log sheets

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Niskin
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Niskin bottle number according to CTD log sheets

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Longitude
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Longitude at start of cast (West is negative)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: CTD_SBE35T
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Temperature from SeaBird 35 CTD which has 8 second average taken at time of the bottle fire. This sensor has an accuracy of 0.0001C as compared to the standard profiling units which have an accuracy of 0.002C.

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: PAR
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:units: microEinsteins per second per square meter (uE/m^2/sec)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Niskin_temp
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: modeled Niskin temperature when it gets back on deck

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Bact
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Bacterioplankton abundance from microscopy with DAPI stain

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: BP_Leu
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Heterotrophic bacterial production based on 3H leucine incorporation

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: TDAA_QF
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Total dissolved amino acid quality flag

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: V1V2_ID
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Sequence ID for 16S amplicon V1V2 region

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Sunrise
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Time of sunrise in UTC derived from CTD data and computed from geographic position and date

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Sunset
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Time of sunset in UTC derived from CTD data and computed from geographic position and date

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: MLD_dens125
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Mixed layer depth defined by surface density plus 0.125 kilograms per cubed meter (see Acquisition description)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: MLD_bvfrq
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Depth of "active mixing" defined by buoyancy frequency after Mojica & Gaube (see Acquisition description)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: MLD_densT2
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: MLD from Thermal Expansion Coeff, and dT=0.2 deg C (see Acqusition description)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: DCM
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Depth of chlorophyll maximum (from CTD fluorometer)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: VertZone
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Vertical Zone designation where vertical layers 0 to 10 are defined by dynamical and biogeochemical criteria (see Table 1 under Supplemental Files)

sources.title: Chemical analyses of size-fractionated particle samples collected during the BIOS-SCOPE cruise AE1819 in the Sargasso Sea in July 2018

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: size_fraction_um
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: particle size range for water fraction

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: split_type
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Condition under which filter was stored and split into fractions for analysis (frozen or freeze dried)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: d13C_phytol_corrected_value_per_mil
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: stable carbon isotope composition of phytol

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: d13C_phytol_sd_per_mil
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: stable carbon isotope composition of phytol standard deviation

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: d13C_POC_per_mil
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: stable carbon isotope composition of bulk particulate organic carbon

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: d13C_POC_sd_per_mil
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: stable carbon isotope composition of bulk particulate organic carbon standard deviation

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: d13C_THAA_per_mil
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: d13C values of total hydrolysable amino acids

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: TP_from_d15N_AA
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: POM trophic position (TP) calculated from measured d15N values of glutamic acid+glutamine (Glx) and phenylalanine (Phe) as in Chikaraishi et al. (2009): TP = (d15NGlx - d15NPhe - 3.4)/7.6 + 1 . TP propagated uncertainty was calculated as in Jarman et al. (2017).

sources.title: Size fractionated Amino Acid data collected in the Sargasso Sea during BIOS-SCOPE cruises AE2114 and AE2123 in August and November 2021

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Size_fraction
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Particle size range for water fraction

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Filter_type
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Filter type used for particle fraction (Nitex, GF/C ,GF75)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Asp
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration: Aspartic Acid. One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Asp_sd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: standard deviation of Aspartic Acid concentration

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Glu
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Glutamic Acid.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Glu_sd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: standard deviation of Glutamic Acid concentration

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: HisSer
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Histidine+Serine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: HisSer_sd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: standard deviation of Histidine+Serine amino acid concentration

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Arg
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Arginine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Thr
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Threonine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Gly
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Glycine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Bala
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Beta-alanine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Tyr
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Tyrosine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Ala
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Alanine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: GABA
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Gamma-aminobutyric acid.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: GABA_sd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: standard deviation of Gamma-aminobutyric acid concentration

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Met
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Methionine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Val
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Valine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Phe
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Phenylalanine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Ile
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Isoleucine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Leu
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Leucine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Lys
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: average amino acid concentration:  Lysine.  One filter split was prepared per sample, and three aliquots from the final prepared solution were analyzed (triplicate injections).

sources.title: Size fractionated carbohydrate data collected in the Sargasso Sea during BIOS-SCOPE cruises AE2114 and AE2123 in August and November 2021

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Size_fraction
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Particle size range for water fraction

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Filter_type
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Filter type used for particle fraction (Nitex, GF/C ,GF75)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: MurAc
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Carbohydrate monomer average concentration: Muramic acid

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: MurAc_sd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Standard deviation of Muramic acid concentration

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: GalURA
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Carbohydrate monomer average concentration: Galacturonic acid

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: GalURA_sd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Standard deviation of Galacturonic acid concentration

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: GlcURA
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Carbohydrate monomer average concentration: Glucuronic acid

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: GlcURA_sd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Standard deviation of Glucuronic acid concentration

sources.title: Size Fractionated Particulate Organic Carbon (POC) and Particulate Organic Nitrogen (PON) collected during BIOS-SCOPE cruises (2018-2023) aboard the R/V Atlantic Explorer

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Size_fraction
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Particle size range for water fraction

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Filter_type
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Filter type used for particle fraction (Nitex, GF/C ,GF75)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: Depth
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Water column depth of sample averaged over sampling period (duration of pump time)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: PN
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: PN; average bulk particulate nitrogen (one sample filter analyzed, replicate blanks used to incorporate uncertainty)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: PN_sd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: standard deviation for bulk particulate nitrogen

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: POC
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: POC; average bulk particulate organic carbon (one sample filter analyzed, replicate blanks used to incorporate uncertainty)

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: POC_sd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: standard deviation for bulk particulate organic carbon

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: CN_acnonac
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: Carbon to nitrogen ratio of acidified POC to non-acidified PN

bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:name: CN_acnonac_sd
bcodmo:parameters.bcodmo:description: standard deviation of CN ratio (propagated error from POC and PN)
